H0.text: Mass is what two samples of gold must have the same.

H1.text: Volume is the property that two samples of gold must have the same.

H2.text: Length is the property that two samples of gold must have the same.

H3.text: Density is the property that two samples of gold must have the same.

A4.text: Gold has a density of 19.3 g/cm3, almost identical to that of tungsten at 19.25 g/cm3
